title:
Averaging Over the Unitarian Group and the Monotonicity Conjecture of
  Merris and Watkins

title_detail.value:
Averaging Over the Unitarian Group and the Monotonicity Conjecture of
  Merris and Watkins

summary:
We show that the monotonicity conjecture of Merriss and Watkins is true in
average when taking the set of matrices of given non negative spectra as
probability space with respect to the Haar measure of the unitarian group .

summary_detail.value:

We show that the monotonicity conjecture of Merriss and Watkins is
true in average when taking the set of matrices of given non negative
spectra as probability space with respect to the Haar measure of the
unitarian group .
